name: Władysław I
overview: Władysław I is a shareware, turn-based strategy game, taking place in the twelfth century, during the regional break-up of Poland. As a prince of one of the district, the player must defeat the other rulers and unite the country. The gameplay is similar to Civilization, including cities development, diplomacy, trade or science. There are random encounters included, few types of scenarios and random map generation implemented.
